data.title: Art Deco Penthouse 1BHK Bungalow on an 80x100 feet Plot
data.description: This design is inspired by the elegance of Art Deco style combined with modern minimalism. The bungalow features a Vastu-compliant layout for positive energy flow and incorporates spacious balconies adjoining each bedroom for enhanced privacy and natural light. Designed specifically for an 80x100 feet plot, this single-level structure maximizes functionality and aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious open living area with Art Deco accents and a central focal point for gatherings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with a Vastu-compliant orientation and features a private balcony for outdoor space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom for guests, complete with its own balcony to ensure privacy and a connection to nature.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen, featuring modern appliances and Art Deco style cabinetry.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-equipped bathroom designed with privacy in mind and Vastu guidelines for energy balance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A cozy dining space that complements the open living area.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace optimized for productivity and natural light.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is located in the south as per Vastu principles for auspicious entry.

openings.name: Balcony Exit (Master Bedroom)
openings.description: Provides access to the balcony from the master bedroom, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Exit (Guest Bedroom)
openings.description: Provides access to the balcony from the guest bedroom, aligning with Vastu orientations.
